title: Southville Primary School expansion brings together the old and new (Bristol City Council)
text: ( Source : Bristol City Council ) Southville Primary School held its official opening celebration today ( 20 October ) to mark the school's recent expansion. The school has added 420 additional places and now operates from two sites - a new
